channel.title: Online [PI]
channel.description:
how to i make my [PI] server to be able to play online im getting this do i have to change this?:
[2/27/11 9:39 AM]: Launching Taboo-scape... [2/27/11 9:39 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594

item.title: Online [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

[quote=“DynastyRSPS, post:5, topic:384253”][quote author=Maikie61 link=topic=480015.msg3514151#msg3514151 date=1298824908]

how to i make my [PI] server to be able to play online im getting this do i have to change this?:

[2/27/11 9:39 AM]: Launching Taboo-scape…
[2/27/11 9:39 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594

Go to server.java and change the 0.0.0.0 to your current IP.
[/quote]
Lol… No…? That doesn’t matter at all, his server is on, but its not public yet.[/quote]

You realise that’s because the I.P of his server is set to 0.0.0.0 so it doesn’t connect to other clients? But only to his client on his pc cuz of localhost?

Read full topic

item.description:

how to i make my [PI] server to be able to play online im getting this do i have to change this?:

[2/27/11 9:39 AM]: Launching Taboo-scape…
[2/27/11 9:39 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594

[/quote]

Go to server.java and change the 0.0.0.0 to your current IP.[/quote]
Lol… No…? That doesn’t matter at all, his server is on, but its not public yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Online [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

[quote=“iamminesmith, post:1, topic:384253”]how to i make my [PI] server to be able to play online im getting this do i have to change this?:

[quote]
[2/27/11 9:39 AM]: Launching Taboo-scape…
[2/27/11 9:39 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594
[/quote][/quote]

Go to server.java and change the 0.0.0.0 to your current IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Online [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DynastyRSPS DynastyRSPS
item.description:
@DynastyRSPS wrote:

iamminesmith:

i have portforwarded, but ive never done it on a linksys router, do i do FTP HTTP or PPTP

You do TCP/UDP, also, you must learn how to open a port. Look it up on google. I used to be in the same position as you, and I’d absolutely love to help you.

Read full topic
